title: Public Agenda: Ellensburg City Council meeting
title_page: Public Agenda: Ellensburg City Council meeting
maintext:
When: 7 p.m. Monday
Where: City Council Chambers, Ellensburg City Hall, 501 N. Anderson St.
Agenda: The council will continue to discuss a Kittitas County and Ellensburg Rodeo Board request for $200,000 annually for 20 years in support of the Rodeo Arena renovation and stadium seating project.
Have your say: City Council meetings are open to the public. There is time set aside at each meeting for public comment on non-agenda items and the public may comment during the discussion portion of agenda items.
